affliction.Text: Gain 4 mana cards. You may deal 1 damage to yourself. If you do, gain 2 extra cards

aftershock.Text: Gain 1 mana card. Place 1 mana card on the mana deck and deal damage equal to its power

amnesia.Text: Deal 1 damage. Deal 1 additional damage for each time this spell was cast previously this turn

arcane eye.Text: Pick up a mana card off each of your spells that costs 3 or more

arcane tactics.Text: Draw 7 mana cards from the mana deck. Then place 4 mana cards from your hand on top of the mana deck in any order

bad fortune.Text: Deal 4 damage. Reveal 3 cards from the mana deck. Place any revealed 1 power mana on this spell. Return the rest in any order

battle vision.Text: When your opponent basic attacks, you may discard a mana card of the same power from your hand to block the damage

betrayal.Text: Deal 5 damage. Your opponent gains 3 mana cards

blood lust.Text: Deal 1 damage. Deal an additional 2 damage for each attack spell cast consecutively before this spell

coercive agreement.Text: Choose 1: Take up to 3 randomly selected mana from your opponent's hand, or discard a mana card off 2 of your other spells

contamination.Text: Place 2 mana cards from your hand on the mana deck. If you do, deal 4 damage

dance of pain.Text: Deal 3 damage. Discard or gain mana until you have 2 mana cards in your hand

delusion.Text: Deal 3 damage. You may pick up a mana card off 1 of your opponent's spells

doom drop.Text: Each time a mana card is discarded of this spell, deal damage equal to that mana's power

drain soul.Text: Your opponent must give you the highest power card mana in their hand. Deal damage equal to that mana's power

energy reserve.Text: Pick up a mana card off 1 of your other spells. Gain mana equal to that mana's power

energy shield.Text: Pickup a mana card off 1 of your other spells. Place a mana card from the mana deck on 1 of your opponent's spells

energy storm.Text: Deal 3 damage. Deal 1 additional damage for each 4 power mana in your hand

false face.Text: If you deal 1 or less damage during your basic attack phase, deal 3 damage when your turn ends

fatal flaw.Text: Deal 1 damage. Reveal the top mana card on 1 of your opponents spells, dealing additional damage equal to it's power

fire blast.Text: Discard all mana in your hand. Deal 7 damage

force of nature.Text: Deal 4 damage, minus 1 damage for each of your other attack spells that have mana on them

fracture.Text: Gain 4 mana cards. You may move a mana card between 2 of your other spells

freeze.Text: Choose 1: Gain 4 mana cards, or place a mana card from the mana deck on one of your opponent's spells

friendly truce.Text: Your opponent may give you 3 cards from their hand. If they do not, gain 5 mana cards

fury.Text: Deal 1 damage for each of your opponent's spells that have mana on them

gleam of hope.Text: Gain mana until you have 5 mana cards in your hand

growth.Text: During your turn, increase the power of all mana by 1

guilty bond.Text: Show your opponent a mana from your hand. Deal 2 damage if they have a mana of the same power in their hand

haste.Text: The next time you cast a spell this turn, it costs 2 less

hellstorm.Text: Gain 5 mana cards. Deal damage equal to the highest power mana you gain

hoodwink.Text: Deal 6 damage, minus the damage your opponent dealt their last basic attack phase

ice storm.Text: Deal 1 damage for each of your spells with exactly 1 mana card on them

living wind.Text: Gain 6 mana cards, gain 1 fewer mana for each of your other spells that have a mana on them

lullaby.Text: As long as there is mana on this spell, if you have 0 mana cards in your hand, gain 2 mana cards

mirror image.Text: Gain mana equal to the quantity of mana cards on 1 of your spells

mist of pain.Text: Your opponent may discard up to 4 mana cards from their hand. For each mana they do not discard, deal 1 damage

mutation.Text: Gain 1 mana card. Deal damage equal to that mana's power

overload.Text: Deal damage equal to the quantity of mana cards on 1 of your opponent's spell

painful vision.Text: Deal 5 damage. Place a mana from the mana deck on all your spells with 1 mana card on them

possessed.Text: Deal 5 damage. Your opponent may give you a mana from their hand. If they do, reduce your damage by the mana's power

power hungry.Text: Both players basic attack mana cards go to your hand instead of the discard pile

puppetmaster.Text: In order to basic attack, your opponent must use a mana of the same power as you did during the previous basic attack phase

quick swap.Text: Each time you discard off this spell, choose 1: deal 1 damage, or discard this spell and replace it with a new spell

reckless attack.Text: Deal 1 damage each time you discard off this spell. If you discard a 4 power mana off this spell, deal 4 damage instead

rejuvenation.Text: Choose 1: Gain 4 mana cards, or take 2 mana cards of any power from the discard pile

renewal.Text: Gain mana until you have 4 mana cards in your hand

renewed fervor.Text: Pick up a mana card off each of your instant attack spells that costs 2 or less

second strike.Text: Deal 3 damage. The next time you cast an attack spell this turn, it costs 1 less

secret oath.Text: As long as this spell has mana on it, if your opponent has a 4 power mana in their hand, they must give it to you immediately

shackled motion.Text: Choose 1: Gain 4 mana cards, or your opponent must discard their hand

shadow attack.Text: Discard a mana card off 1 of your other spells. Deal damage and gain mana equal to that mana's power

shared power.Text: You may give your opponent 1 mana card from your hand. If you do, gain 4 mana cards

silent support.Text: Each time you discard off this spell, pick up a mana off 1 of your other spells

sleight of hand.Text: Gain 1 mana card. Gain additional mana equal to that mana's power

sneaky deal.Text: Choose 1: Deal 1 damage, or discard a mana card off 1 of your other spells

soul pact.Text: If the previous spell you cast this turn was an instant attack spell, gain mana equal to the damage dealt by that spell

stone crush.Text: Deal 1 damage for each mana card in your opponent's hand

time distortion.Text: Pick up a mana card off 2 of your other spells

touch the void.Text: Deal damage equal to the quantity of mana cards on 1 of your spells

toxic gift.Text: Give your opponent a mana card from your hand. If you do, deal damage equal to its power

trance state.Text: Deal 3 damage, minus 1 damage for each mana card in your hand

trap attack.Text: Pick up a mana card off 1 of your other spells. Deal damage equal to that mana's power

tsunami.Text: Gain 1 mana card. Deal 1 damage for each mana of a unique power in your hand

twist of fate.Text: Deal 2 damage. You may discard and replace 1 of your other spells with a new spell. Move all mana on it onto the new spell

vile laughter.Text: Deal 6 damage, minus the highest power mana in your hand

wild bloom.Text: When you discard the last mana off this spell, you may immediately cast an instant spell of yours that has 0 mana on it for no cost

windstorm.Text: Deal 2 damage, then reveal a mana card from the mana deck. If it's a 1 power mana card, place it on this spell

wrath.Text: Your opponent may discard 2 mana cards from their hand. If they do not, deal 2 damage
